page.title: 06FENCE 'S VICAR INTERVIEWED
page.content: {HOW DO THE CHURCHES DIFFER HERE FROM {JAMAICA ? THERE ISN'T MUCH DIFFERENCE EXCEPT THAT THE BLACK CHURCHES ARE MORE EMOTIONAL WITH SINGING AND DANCING. {WHAT PERCENTAGE OF THE POPULATION GO {TO CHURCH IN ENGLAND AND IN JAMACA ? WELL IN ENGLAND IT'S ABOUT 10% BUT IN JAMACA IT'S ABOUT 70%. {DO YOU LIKE LIVING HERE ? YES {DO YOU MIND THE WEATHER ? NOW AND AGAIN IT GETS ME DOWN. {DO YOU FIND FENCE A FRIENDIY VILLAGE ? YES ,ESPECIALLY THE PEOPLE THAT HAVE BEEN HERE A LONG TIME. {WHAT IS THE ROLE OF OUR CHURCH? IT POINTS THE PEOPLE TO JESUS MAINLY. {WHEN WAS THE CHURCH BUILT? ABOUT 200 YEARS AGO. {HOW MANY PEOPLE MARRIED IN THE CHURCH {LAST YEAR? }11 COUPLES.
